About Us

We are a grassroots, volunteer-led group dedicated to advancing awareness and acceptance of non-monogamy in Lisboa. Our mission is to create a safe space where everyone can explore, learn, and share about relationships in all their forms.

By hosting events, sharing resources, and connecting like-minded individuals, we aim to foster a community built on respect, inclusivity, and openness.
